summary: Adds an Inn to shor\'s Stone named Redbelly Inn. it\'s fully functional
descriptionHtml:
adds a normal inn to shor\'s stone near riften. you can rent a bed & buy supplies from the innkeeper there is also a khajit named das\\\'ha who is sopouse to be a follower but i didn\'t get it right somehow it will be fixed in later versions of the mod 

Installation:

just put the file (Shor\'s Stone Inn) to the data folder in the main skyrim directory !

Bugs: 

i\'ve tested the mod and it works fine but if you find any let me know.

also if i fix the follower  Dasha you can contact me if you want a custom follower in the game 
any race you want and even whit moded armor and any skills.
author: Carnthum
